summary: A small town mod to make Karthwasten a more robust miner's town.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=5]ClefJ's Karthwasten[/size][/color]

Note: This was an experiment of mine using the BSCyrodiil farmhouse resources, and just some exterior facelifts in general. I've been very busy lately, and working on a much larger town mod, this was kind of a side project.

If anyone would like to take up this mod, I'd be perfectly fine with that.

What this mod offers is a general store trader, an inn, and a couple new buildings and models that might make the town of Karthwasten a more noticeable miner's town, with a burned-down house to note that a massacre had taken place in the village, as evident in Seasons Unending dialogue. The Inn has inn services, but without a rent room script currently, since there's also a (somewhat incomplete) player home in town too! The key is in the destroyed house near the front entrance. Again, this was a side project experiment.

No requirements other than the Skyrim and Update master files. No scripts, no fuss. ...It might need a proper cleaning if it's to be used seriously, of course.

Thanks to [color=#00ffff]Markusliberty [/color]for the Cyrodiil Farmhouse Tileset!

I hope you like! And if you decide to pick this one up to work on yourself, I wish you luck!
author: ClefJ
